name: fake-gambling-site
description: A fake gambling website with various games

scripts.build: parcel build src/js/main.js --dist-dir public/js --public-url /js/ && sass src/scss/main.scss public/assets/styles/main.css
scripts.dev: parcel src/js/main.js --dist-dir public/js --public-url /js/ && sass --watch src/scss/main.scss public/assets/styles/main.css
scripts.predeploy: npm run clean && npm run build
